name: Spaceventure (andungha)
description:
A simple game

You control a rocket , avoid obstacles to venture in space 

With each planet you find , you rocket gains more abbilities (future idea)

Controls : left,right arrow

Hold Space to boost the rocket

escape to pause

might add more levels in the future

Music used in the game:Orbital Collossus by Matthew Pablo

https://opengameart.org/content/space-boss-battle-theme
